message.entry: Unable to solve the collocation equations -- a singular Jacobian encountered.

Unable to meet the tolerance without using more than {0,number,integer} mesh points. \n The last mesh of {1,number,integer} points and the solution are available in the output argument. \n The maximum residual is {2}, while requested accuracy is {3}.
The solution was obtained on a mesh of {0} points.\n
There were {0} calls to the ODE function. \n
There were {0} calls to the BC function. \n
Results may be inaccurate because of an ill-conditioned Jacobian whose reciprocal condition number is {0}.
